name: The Indigo Parallel DEMO
description:
Take a peek into a weird psychedelic journey into madness. Explore multiple branching pathways that lead into procedural altered levels that boggle the mind. Interact with creatures and explore the depths of a creative and colorful world.

Inspired by the captivating visuals and surreal gameplay of LSD: Dream Emulator and the narrative experimentation of The Stanley Parable, The Indigo Parallel offers a fascinating, immersive experience that is both strange and exhilarating.
